website_summaries.verdict: Designed with electricians in mind, the saws in this 19-piece set are perfect for cutting through wood, drywall, and mild steel.
pros: Includes 14 hole saws ranging in size from 3/4 to 4-3/4 inches
Matrix II Bi-Metal teeth for durability
Less stress on teeth, thanks to radiused Tooth Back
Deep gullet makes it easy to remove chips
cons: Saws will cut through soft metal 1/4 inches and thinner
Cutting harder metals may damage the teeth

customer_reviews.title: The best Hole Saws Available!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is excellent and the quality of these hole saws is top-notch. I checked all of the hole saws available and this is the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but needs tool to change stuck saws
customer_reviews.text: I like this hole saw set. Comes with a variety of bits and are the deepest around and they can cut anything. HOWEVER, when I used these to cut holes, they are almost impossible to unscrew and change saws. As you're sawing, the saw screws so tight that I literally cannot get them off to change sizes. I've tried everything. This kit NEEDS to come with a tool to unscrew these better. I'm ruining my saws bending the metal just trying to unscrew them and it's way too much of a pain. Thinking about returning them and getting a new one and putting grease on the threads next time to hopefully make it easier
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, great case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit with a good case. Lots of sizes all in one case. Seem to stay sharp after some moderate use. The quick change is ok although I prefer what Bosch offers as it's quicker. I bought this for the number of sizes that fit into the case and the positive latches and heavy duty hinge they used. When you carry a hole saw kit into somebodies house the last thing you want is it spilling open and bouncing on a customers hardwood floor. This happened to me with the previous saw kit with a really cheap case. My only complaint is I wish they made the plug easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: michael simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee is on a bit of a roll these days.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is these are best in class! I’ve used many different brands of hole saws and Milwaukee makes one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: John Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need for just about any project. I used this to punch a ventilation hole for a power supply through the 1/8" steel belly of a Red Harbinger cross desk. Hard stuff. Not an easy cut. Required a Milwaukee cordless impact drill, some masking tape, and maximum effort, but the bit and blade cut flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: David Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are great, bought them for my friend whose an electrician and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of hope saws. Very sharp and cut great.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance A. McElfish

customer_reviews.title: Great hole saws
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, well designed hole saws. They like low speed, high torque drivers though, especially on the larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are just what my husband wanted. Heavy duty and every size you could want.
customer_reviews.author: SSR

customer_reviews.title: 19 pcs. Hole saw
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the complete set that I was looking for. I used to buy piece by piece and it always comes out way more expensive. The shipping was fast. I would recommend this item to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: bernard ursal

customer_reviews.title: Hole Saws
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of hole saws. I have bought individual Ice holes saws in the past and they worked great. This has a nice heavy duty case with two metal latches and heavy duty handle. Milwaukee made a nice set here.
customer_reviews.author: John in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade top of the line.
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee as developed this very complete kit with the working man in mind. well constructed tough and versatile. great price point, well thought out design. Heavy duty case holds all the components in place and has additional storage bay as well for small parts.
customer_reviews.author: steev

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - a really nice set. Goes through 1/8" mild steel like it's butter. Keep your work lubricated - the teeth on these holes saws really dig in!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Gabel

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed with this kit
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've used these saws to cut holes in plastic, drywall, and red oak. Minding speed for material being cut, the results have always been outstanding. I've had opportunity to chuck the saws in both a 18V cordless drill and a 16.5" drill press with no problems. This kit provides a great range of sizes and these guys stay sharp! Very nice case set up wisely which conserves room yet still makes each of the saws easily accessible. To sum it up, this "Made in the U.S.A." kit is a great deal for the money and I, personally, would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been an electrician for 39 years best hole saw set I ever owned. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have all your hole saws in one place with the right arbor
customer_reviews.author: GP Stanley

customer_reviews.title: I use it a lot in the electrical field.
customer_reviews.text: I use it a lot in the electrical field. I just got to keep reminding people to keep there hands of my tools
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice Assortment, great cut
customer_reviews.text: I do a far share of electrical, plus other odd projects around house. This set has been great. The case even has room to fit a couple duplicate Hole Saws I had before buying a set. With proper care and usage these blades hold up for a long life.
customer_reviews.author: MarkFrTX

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a few sizes but bought the whole set and very glad i did! easy to use . YES
customer_reviews.author: henryford

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Awsome saw. The case has a lot of rooms for more circular saw storaging if you decide to buy more
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These hole saws are just OK but because Milwaukee doesn't honor warranty when something breakes that makes this kit not worth the money. I also use Ridgid, Lenox and Dewalt on regular basis and all of them last longer than this kit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Krystlik

customer_reviews.title: Great hole saw kit
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this hole saw kit, but admittedly have only used it once so far. My first use was to drill a hole in a vehicle to install a snorkel. Would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Case came broken
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good product .... does not seem to cut any faster than previous hole saws. Time will tell. Have no idea yet how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hole Saw
customer_reviews.text: I opened the case as soon as it came in to check it out. What I found is that it was missing the three inch hole saw.
customer_reviews.author: dbprimeaux

customer_reviews.title: These bits are great. I have used individually bought bits of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't let fellow workers see this case! They will want to use them. These bits are great. I have used individually bought bits of these previously on metal and wood. They are bi-metal. Just because I have the kit, I have pulled out more odd sizes that I never thought I'd use but now I have them, might as well make my life easier. 1 single con: This set does not come with a 2 1/8". This is the size to bore a hole in a door for a lock set. Very needed for me, however this set is still the best even though I need to purchase 1 extra bit at full price
customer_reviews.author: MaBrey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a very good price. The arbor doesnt seem as tough as others I have seen but it works. 3 extra bits is nice, they always break at the worst times, extras will be nice. Haven't broke one yet but it will happen. Saws cut well, haven't used any size enough to see how they wear, but so far been great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hole saw kit for any tradesman. Sturdy, durable materials make this a well built kit. Bits are nice and sharp which makes for clean cut holes.
customer_reviews.author: P. Graves

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 49-22-4105 Master Electricians Ice Hardened Hole Saw Kit 19 Piece
product_meta.description:
19-PC ELECTRICIAN HOLE DOZER HOLE SAW KIT. The product is easy to use. The product is durable. The product is manufactured in United States.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Milwaukee Electric Tool Corporation introduces Ice Hardened hole saws, a new generation of hole saws that offer up to 50% longer life than the competition and are ideal for metal and wood cutting in a wide variety of HVAC, electrical, plumbing and maintenance/repair applications. Milwaukee Ice Hardened products utilize a proprietary cryogenic hardening process that improves upon traditional heat treat processes. Unlike surface coatings that wear away, cryogenics harden to the core by minimizing soft metal (austenite) and creating more hard metal (martensite). The result is a product that is more consistently hard throughout, resulting in life up to 50% longer than the competition. Milwaukee Ice Hardened hole saws also feature Matrix II bi-metal construction for greater durability and a unique precision-ground tooth geometry for faster cutting. A positive rake angle cuts more aggressively while deeper gullets quickly remove chips. A radiused back face reduces stress on the teeth, ensuring that the blade delivers optimum life and speed. Functional slot geometry allows for a standard slotted screwdriver to fit completely underneath the plug for easier plug removal. Kit Includes: Fourteen (14) hole saws: 3/4", 7/8", 1-1/8", 1-3/8", 1-1/2", 1-3/4", 2", 2-1/4", 2-1/2", 2-5/8", 3", 3-5/8", 4-1/8", 4-3/4"; Two (2) arbors: 49-56-7010, 49-56-9100; Three (3) drill bits: 49-56-8010; One (1) adapter: 49-56-6560; One (1) spacer: 49-67-0120; Space for additional hole saws
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use
The product is manufactured in United States
ICE HARDENED for up to 50% longer life than the competition
Matrix II Bi-Metal Teeth for greater durability
Positive Rake Angle for fast cutting
Radiused Tooth Back reduces stress on teeth
Deeper Gullets for fast chip removal and Funtional Slot Geometry provides easy plug removal
